Show / Hide Table of Contents

Class ChromiumProcess

Represents a Chromium process and any associated temporary user data directory that have created by Puppeteer and therefore must be cleaned up when no longer needed.

Inheritance

EnsureExitAsync(Nullable<TimeSpan>)

Asynchronously waits for graceful Chromium process exit within a given timeout period. Kills the Chromium process if it has not exited within this period.

Declaration
public Task EnsureExitAsync(TimeSpan? timeout)
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.Nullable<System.TimeSpan> timeout

The maximum waiting time for a graceful process exit.
